trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAnyElementAttribute"></xref> objects.
Use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAnyElementAttributes> to override the behavior of a set of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAnyElementAttribute> objects.

Multiple instances of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAnyElementAttribute> class can be applied to a class member, as long as each instance has a distinct <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAnyElementAttribute.Name%2A> property value; this instructs the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to collect unknown elements under the named element into the appropriate array.
It is for this reason that multiple instances of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAnyElementAttribute> class can be added to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAnyElementAttributes>.
To override a set of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAnyElementAttribute> objects:
Create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAnyElementAttributes>.

Create the set of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAnyElementAttribute> objects, and add each object to the collection using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAnyElementAttributes.Add%2A> method.
Create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes>.
Set the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlAnyElements%2A> property to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAnyElementAttributes>.
Create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides>.
Add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> method.
Create an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides>.
Serialize or deserialize an object that contains the set of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAnyElementAttribute> objects.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAnyElementAttributes"></xref> class.
Adds an <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAnyElementAttribute"></xref> to the collection.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAnyElementAttribute"></xref> to add.
The index of the newly added <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAnyElementAttribute"></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates whether the specified <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAnyElementAttribute"></xref> exists in the collection.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAnyElementAttribute"></xref> you are interested in.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAnyElementAttribute"></xref> exists in the collection; otherwise, `false`.
Copies the entire collection to a compatible one-dimensional array of <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute"></xref> objects, starting at the specified index of the target array.
The one-dimensional array of <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute"></xref> objects that is the destination of the elements copied from the collection.
The array must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in array at which copying begins.
Gets the index of the specified <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAnyElementAttribute"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAnyElementAttribute"></xref> whose index you want.
The index of the specified <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAnyElementAttribute"></xref>.
Inserts an <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAnyElementAttribute"></xref> into the collection at the specified index.
The index where the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAnyElementAttribute"></xref> is inserted.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAnyElementAttribute"></xref> to insert.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAnyElementAttribute"></xref> at the specified index.
The index of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAnyElementAttribute"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAnyElementAttribute"></xref> at the specified index.
Removes the specified <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAnyElementAttribute"></xref> from the collection.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAnyElementAttribute"></xref> to remove.
